LanguageData.Pa_ShotgunT.label: Shotgun Sentry
LanguageData.Pa_ShotgunT.description: Jury-rigged automatic AA12 x2 with simple sensor and support strcture attached to a turret.
LanguageData.Pa_AntiR.label: Anti-Riot Sentry
LanguageData.Pa_AntiR.description: Simple small size autocannon like turret piece, uncapable to fire any standard ammo type.
LanguageData.Turret_ShotgunT.label: IASST
LanguageData.Turret_ShotgunT.description: Improvised Automatic Shotgun Sentry Turret(IASST), An improvised AI-controlled turret with 2 AA-12 that automatically fires at nearby enemies. Requires 500 W to function.\nCaliber: .12 Gauge
LanguageData.Turret_AntiR.label: Anti-Riot Sentry Turret
LanguageData.Turret_AntiR.description: An AI-controlled turret with adaptive barrel that fires at peaceful protest mobs, is not a combat turret. Requires 500 W to function.\nCaliber: Any Non-lethal and less lethal ammo
LanguageData.Minified_ShotgunT.label: IASST
LanguageData.Minified_AntiR.label: Anti-Riot Sentry Turret
